subject: Baseball
Robberies and Thefts
Jewels and Jewelry
lead_paragraph: Mets reliever Ambiorix Burgos had more than $270,000 worth of jewelry stolen, but by Wednesday afternoon he had recovered all but five pieces.
snippet: Mets reliever Ambiorix Burgos had more than $270,000 worth of jewelry stolen, but by Wednesday afternoon he had recovered all but five pieces.
